reviewText:
When my grandchildren were toddlers I came across this video in our Public Library and with the help of the Librarians was able to purchase Christmas Cartoon Festival for my family.  The story about the famous French Canadian hockey player  Rocket Maurice Richard "The Sweater" was our initial favorite but over time each cartoon on this wonderful video became beloved.

My grandchildren are now adolescents but they put this video on every December and we all sit down to be delighted once again.
